import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import classNames from 'classnames' import Sidebar from './components/Sidebar' import MainContent from './components/MainContent' export default function App() { const [hotels, setHotels] = useState([]) const [currentTab, setCurrentTab] = useState('description') useEffect(() => { fetch('api/hotels/index.json') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { console.log(data) setHotels([...data.list]) }) .catch((error) => console.error(error)) fetch('api/hotels/venetian.json') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => console.log(data)) .catch((error) => console.error(error)) }, []) return (
←
SEE ALL LAS VEGAS HOTELS
